questions.question: Choose the word that best fits the blank: The company adopted a _______ strategy to increase its market share.
Find the error in the sentence: The team are working on the project since last month.
Synonym of 'Candid':

Rearrange the sentences to form a coherent paragraph: (A) It promotes teamwork. (B) Sports are essential for holistic development. (C) It also improves physical fitness. (D) Students should participate actively.
Fill in the blank: She was _______ to accept the award on behalf of her team.
Simplify: 18 ÷ 3 × 5 + 7 - 2
If the ratio of two numbers is 3:4 and their sum is 28, what is the smaller number?
questions.native_question: यदि दो संख्याओं का अनुपात 3:4 है और उनका योग 28 है, तो छोटी संख्या क्या है?

questions.question: What is the simple interest on Rs. 5000 at 6% per annum for 3 years?
A train travels 240 km in 4 hours. What is its speed in km/h?
questions.native_question: एक ट्रेन 240 किमी को 4 घंटे में तय करती है। इसकी गति किमी/घंटा में क्या है?

questions.question: If 20% of a number is 15, what is the number?
If 'PEN' is coded as 'QFO', how is 'INK' coded?
questions.native_question: यदि 'PEN' को 'QFO' के रूप में कोडित किया जाता है, तो 'INK' को कैसे कोडित किया जाएगा?

questions.question: In a row of 25 people, Ravi is 9th from the left. What is his position from the right?
questions.native_question: 25 लोगों की एक पंक्ति में, रवि बाईं ओर से 9वाँ है। उसकी दाईं ओर से स्थिति क्या है?

questions.question: Which comes next in the series: 2, 6, 12, 20, 30, ?
If all roses are flowers and some flowers are red, which statement is true?
What is the full form of RTGS?
questions.native_question: RTGS का पूर्ण रूप क्या है?

questions.question: Which bank was merged with Bank of Baroda in 2019?
Antonym of 'Expand':
Choose the correct spelling:
What is the compound interest on Rs. 8000 at 5% per annum for 2 years, compounded annually?
A boat travels 36 km downstream in 3 hours. If the speed of the stream is 2 km/h, what is the speed of the boat in still water?
questions.native_question: एक नाव 36 किमी धारा के साथ 3 घंटे में तय करती है। यदि धारा की गति 2 किमी/घंटा है, तो स्थिर जल में नाव की गति क्या है?

questions.question: What is the full form of RAM in computers?
In a certain code, 'COMPUTER' is written as 'DNOVQFUS'. How is 'KEYBOARD' written in that code?
Choose the correct phrase to replace the underlined part: He is *not interested in* playing football.
If a shirt costs Rs. 400 after a 20% discount, what was its original price?
Find the odd one out: 4, 9, 16, 25, 35
Who is the Governor of the Reserve Bank of India as of 2022?
questions.native_question: 2022 तक भारतीय रिज़र्व बैंक का गवर्नर कौन है?

questions.question: Identify the correctly punctuated sentence:
options: A. Where are you going, she asked.
B. Where are you going? she asked.
C. Where are you going she asked?
D. Where are you going, she asked?
E. Where are you going? She asked.
questions.answer: B. Where are you going? she asked.

questions.question: What is the average of the first 10 prime numbers?
If today is Wednesday, what day will it be after 45 days?
questions.native_question: यदि आज बुधवार है, तो 45 दिन बाद कौन सा दिन होगा?

questions.question: What is the minimum age to open a savings bank account in India?
A shopkeeper sells an item at a profit of 20%. If the cost price is Rs. 500, what is the selling price?
Choose the correct word to complete the sentence: The meeting was _______ due to unforeseen circumstances.
If 3 pens cost Rs. 45, how much will 7 pens cost?
questions.native_question: यदि 3 पेन की कीमत 45 रुपये है, तो 7 पेन की कीमत कितनी होगी?

questions.question: Complete the analogy: Book : Library :: Food : ?
Which organization regulates the insurance sector in India?
questions.native_question: भारत में बीमा क्षेत्र को कौन सा संगठन नियंत्रित करता है?

questions.question: If the perimeter of a square is 48 cm, what is its area?
Find the error in the sentence: Neither of the boys have finished their homework.
What is the LCM of 12 and 18?
questions.native_question: 12 और 18 का लघुत्तम समापवर्तक (LCM) क्या है?

questions.question: If 'FRIEND' is coded as 'IKSFMR', how is 'ENEMY' coded?
What is the currency of Japan?
A man completes a work in 15 days. How many days will it take for 3 men to complete the same work?
Choose the correct idiom to complete the sentence: Don’t count your chickens _______ they hatch.
If a number is increased by 25% and then decreased by 20%, what is the net percentage change?
Find the missing number: 3, 8, 18, 38, ?
What is the tagline of the State Bank of India?
questions.native_question: भारतीय स्टेट बैंक का टैगलाइन क्या है?
options: A. With You All The Way
B. The Banker to Every Indian
questions.answer: B. The Banker to Every Indian

questions.question: If the area of a circle is 154 cm², what is its radius? (Use π = 22/7)
Choose the word that is opposite in meaning to 'Reluctant':
A sum of Rs. 6000 amounts to Rs. 7200 in 2 years at simple interest. What is the rate of interest?
If 'APPLE' is coded as 'CRTKG', how is 'MANGO' coded?
questions.native_question: यदि 'APPLE' को 'CRTKG' के रूप में कोडित किया जाता है, तो 'MANGO' को कैसे कोडित किया जाएगा?

questions.question: Which act governs the banking sector in India?
questions.native_question: भारत में बैंकिंग क्षेत्र को कौन सा अधिनियम नियंत्रित करता है?
